citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:45am on 11-
JAN-22. The inspector spoke to the licensee by phone and he stated he could not leave work for several hours.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:45am on 11-
JAN-22.  The inspector spoke to the licensee by phone and he stated he could not leave work for several hours. 
 
 
 
End Section
